channel.title: Dropping Items
channel.description: I am currently hosting a vistex v7, and i am one of few that are not completely leeched. When i tried having a drop party, i was able to drop items, but those items did not show up for any characters, i could see them, but they dissapeared after a little

item.title: Dropping Items
item.dc:creator: @Meh_i_own Meh i own
item.description:
@Meh_i_own wrote:

I am currently hosting a vistex v7, and i am one of few that are not completely leeched. When i tried having a drop party, i was able to drop items, but those items did not show up for any characters, i could see them, but they dissapeared after a little

Read full topic
